author: juergen
msg: Adoption for Tomcat 4.1.9 (and higher). The request URL received from Tomcat is now utf-8 encoded.

author: juergen
msg: use getBytes to translate a character to a byteArray instead of a Stream.

author: msmith
msg: Some minor bugfixes (sending content-type headers, for example), and
some refactoring to make subclassing this class useful.

author: jericho
msg: - Add an easy way to support old character encodings
- Make static methods for setting and getting charset.
